feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Return to Study and Goals for 2026

link.title: Return to Study and Goals for 2026

entry.content:
Hello everyone and Happy new Year!

It has been some time since the creation of this following Github page and I would like to take the time to detail my goals for the 2026.

By the end of this year I intend to complete the Security+ exam, complete a personal project of creating a Honey Pot from start to finish as well as

continuing to detail walkthroughs of Blue Team HTB Sherlocks. Everyday brings new concepts and challenges and I am excited to keep learning and developing my skills.

Updates to come!
